item.description: Musicians Maxim Lubarsky and Angela Rossi will be performing and take you on a tour through traditional French music. The show has been performed at a number of well-known concert halls and theaters throughout the United States. The fundraiser event benefits the Children of Sderot Project. You can find more information about the event at: http://www.eabc.tv/EA... And additional information about musicians Maxim Lubarsky and Angela Rossi previous event at: http://www.eabc.tv/EA... Come help support a great cause June 19th at 3pm at 22 Ida Road in Marblehead. Enjoy a great catered meal along with great music. Minimum Contribution is $130 per person Please sign up and RSVP at (781) 631-0331 Hope to see you there and please tell any friends that might be interested.
item.name: French Chanson Music and Picnic Fundraising Event
